parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> This command was meant to break the script into debugger, however currently it doesn't do anything except displaying and logging the following error: <tt>Error Debugger breakpoint hit</tt>.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''halt'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (_displayAnError) [[then]] {[[halt]]};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assert]] [[terminate]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
